body: these artist mostly draws reverse harem situations which are actually good
If someone translate this (the first "arc"), they'll have my infinite gratitude

The art's good, but it seems we're always on the fringe of one side or the other, it's either this or that. Maybe i've been reading hentai for too long, it's all just becoming kinda stale. Though reading porn for the story was weird in the first place, so that's on me.
